How many people are affected by fragile X syndrome ?,"Fragile X syndrome occurs in approximately 1 in 4,000 males and 1 in 8,000 females.",GHR,fragile X syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to fragile X syndrome ?,"Mutations in the FMR1 gene cause fragile X syndrome. The FMR1 gene provides instructions for making a protein called FMRP. This protein helps regulate the producti
